title: Revenue per employee of leading tech companies 2018
yAxis: Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Company Netflix has the highest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars and Amazon has the lowest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars.
Company Netflix has 6.18 times more Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars than Company Amazon which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars 2224555.0 is found at Company Netflix and the minimum is found at Amazon where Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is 359671.0.
